I understand. My condolences, Kevin.

No, Sidney. I don't believe there's any validity to the theory that the shooter was looking for our hero. Yes, he did attend school there at one time. But he's in the middle of his season on DWTS right now. In fact, he confirmed his whereabouts tonight with Megyn Kelly when he called into her show. But, I wondered myself if the name they are releasing is a bogus name (for the shooter) and if the feds are trying to cover up the truth about who he is. Hopefully will learn more about his identity from the victims who survived this travesty they are released and can share their stories. If this guy was targeting Christians, it raises a red flag in my mind! Could he have been an ISIS recrute? Could he just be some crazy white guy? We don't know! But, I wouldn't put it past POTUS to try to cover up the shooter's true identity if he was some sort of Muslim extremist. And we all know that this administration will politicize this situation to push for greater gun control in our nation. We can't afford to let the government ever take away our guns though! If that was to happen, we would not be able to protect ourselves from the government.
